aboutus: ArchiveOnline can be adapted to suit your internal processes for managing inventions to register, infringement searches, surveillance results, etc. Users can, for example, be assigned to groups with associated privileges, in order to tailor the possibilities for them to edit data and documents. The system makes it easy to comment on and rank documents, and to pass them on to the involved parties.
